dcterms:description: The WASSA 2018 shared task dataset consists of around 188,000 tweets annotated with 6 emotion labels (anger, surprise, joy, sad, fear, disgust). The dataset has a balanced distribution of examples for the six label classes.
dcterms:title: WASSA 2018 shared task dataset

dcterms:creator: Cristian Danescu-Niculescu-Mizil
Lillian Lee
dcterms:description: The Cornell Movie Corpus is composed of around 300,000 utterances extracted from 600 movies, with a subset of 58,000 lines manually annotated with 7 emotion labels (fear, surprise, anger, disgust, joy, sad, neutral).
dcterms:title: Cornell Movie Corpus
